meanings.definition: A British coin worth ten pence.
meanings.sent1: I found a shiny tenpence on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: She paid for the candy with a tenpence.
meanings.sent3: The tenpence rolled down the street like a tiny wheel.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as rare as a tenpence in a haystack.
meanings.sent5: The tenpence gleamed in the sunlight, catching my eye.

meanings.definition: An amount of money equal to ten pence.
meanings.sent1: Grandma gave me tenpence to buy a treat.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a millionaire holding tenpence in my hand.
meanings.sent4: Her words were worth more than tenpence to me.
meanings.sent5: Tenpence jingled in his pocket as he walked.
